title: Kurokawa Morio, Arbeit Sagashitemasu!
overview: Kurokawa Morio and his friends have conversations that lead to Morio recalling his past part-time jobs and deepens his love for Yukiko. An unexpected connection between Morio and Yukiko is revealed.This is a side story for Koi Desu!: Yankee-kun to Hakujou Girl drama.
